page.title: 14RAIL TRAVEL
page.content: This is a{commuter area,}therefore a station is a very important part of everyday life.Effingham and Horsley stations were{first used between 1885} {and 1890.}The busiest times are when the commuters go to work between 8_9am and come home between 5_6.30pm. Roughly 400-500 people use them every day.At peak times the trains come to the stations at 20 minute intervals, apart from then they come roughly every half hour.{90 trains } {pass through in a day.}A typical day for a driver is three 4 hour sessions with a 45 minute break between each. A fare to London at peak times costs Â£1.59 and at off peak times it costs Â£1.30.{5-6 people work at both } {stations}and they all feel that the stations are situated in good areas.
